name: All Evil Night
description: This is a story about a cop who witnessed strange events near the city Evilween. You will meet monsters from your nightmares.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
